openadk.library.impl
Class RequestCache

java.lang.Object
  openadk.library.impl.RequestCache
Direct Known Subclasses:
RequestCacheFile
public abstract class RequestCache
extends java.lang.Object

Stores the message ID and SIF Data Object type of each pending SIF_Request message. The RequestCache is a global resource of the class framework. It is only necessary because of an inconsistency in the SIF 1.0r2 Specification in which a SIF_Response with a SIF_Error must have an empty SIF_ObjectData element, which prevents the framework from determining the associated object type. It needs to know the object type to dispatch the SIF_Response to the appropriate QueryResults message handler when Topics are being used.

Version:
1.0
Author:
Eric Petersen
